sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The Ukrainian President Vladimir Zelensky visits a hospital in Kiev to thank medics as the Russian bombardment in the Donbass region continues.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Russian President Vladimir Putin says he'll guarantee the safe passage of grain from the Black Sea ports after he met with the African Union leader.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Smoke continues to billow in the Donbass region with thousands of lives lost in Ukraine during the last 100 days of fighting.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: And Russia continues to pound the eastern region, particularly in the town of Severodonetsk.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Moscow has so far seized around a fifth of the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The Ukrainian health system has had to make a huge coordination effort, but hospitals close to the front line are left without staff and equipment. The NGO Doctors Without Borders is trying to move patients from the area for much-needed medical treatment. Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky visited a hospital in Kyiv on Friday to thank and award medics and staff for their work. He also spoke with servicemen who were wounded in battles.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The 44-year-old says his country is a very different place now.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Exactly 100 days ago, we all woke up to a different reality. Exactly 100 days ago, the rest of us woke up. When Ukrainians are awakened, not by the sun's rays, but with explosions of missiles that hit our homes, then completely different Ukrainians are awakened, not by the sun's rays, but with explosions of missiles that hit our homes, then completely different Ukrainians wake up.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: There are three words that we've been fighting for, for 100 days after eight years.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Peace, victory, Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: But with continuing talk of victory, how many more people will have to queue for basic food and aid in the next hundred days of war? Three weeks of training are needed before Ukrainian troops can use the new rocket systems from the U.S. and Britain. Ukrainian president will be hoping it's not too late to push back advancing Russian forces. Russian President Vladimir Putin says he's ready to support a smooth export of Ukrainian grain via the Black Sea ports. It follows a global food crisis, particularly in vulnerable countries such as Africa. You're quite welcome to export wheat via seaports under Ukrainian control, first of all via the Black Sea ports, Odessa and the nearby ports.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: We didn't mine the Ukrainian ports, it was Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: I've told our colleagues many times, let them clear the mines so the ships loaded with wheat can leave these ports.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: We will guarantee their safe passage with no problems.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The comment came after the head of the African Union, Maki Sol, told Putin that African countries have also become victims of the war in Ukraine. The Senegalese president met with Putin in Sochi, saying that Russia should help ease their suffering. But the Russian president denies he's stopping grain from being exported. Meanwhile, the United Nations spokesman for the Secretary General says a four-way agreement between Russia, Ukraine, Turkey and the UN is a step closer.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: We have seen a lot of positive comments come from various capitals, which is heartening, but I'm not in a position to confirm dates or to provide you with a calendar at this point.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Over in Belarus, Russian ally President Alexander Lukashenko says he's open to allow Ukraine's grain to travel through his country to reach Baltic seaports, but it's on condition that Belarusian goods can be exported from these ports too.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The letter Z serves as a reminder of Russia's war in Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: More than 100 days have passed since the invasion.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: But while patriotic colours fly, there are suggestions that some Russians' attention is starting to flag. A recent poll conducted by the Lavada Centre, seen as a foreign agent in Russia, says 73% of respondents believe the so-called special military operation is successful.

sentences.sentence: After 227 years, Portugal's crown jewels have finally gone on display inside the country's long-unfinished royal palace.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Cave lovers can enjoy prehistoric artworks from the Cosgera Cave at a replica of the underwater cavern in Marseille. Drawings of horses, bison and penguins have all been replicated because the only way of seeing them is to dive to the bottom of the Mediterranean.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The cave was discovered in 1985, 37 meters beneath the sea.

sentences.sentence: I've been working since the beginning on the reconstruction, with my eyes mostly to help the painters and the plastic artists who made all the creations and everything.

sentences.sentence: At the same time, it's to get as close as possible to reality." Some of the cave's treasures date back more than 30,000 years.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02

sentences.sentence: French painter Rosa Bonheur is honoured at Bordeaux's Museum of Fine Arts on the

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: bicentenary of her birth. The exhibition showcases her fascination for animals.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Her love for drawing animals began after her mother taught her to read and write by getting her to draw a different animal for each letter of the alphabet.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The realism artist was also a true icon of women's liberation and popular in the United States and in England.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: And the Van Gogh Museum in Amsterdam presents Colour as Language exhibiting works by the artist Etel Adnan.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The display is the first from a female artist at this museum. It features 72 of her works and is presented alongside 10 works by Vincent van Gogh as he was a significant source of inspiration for Adnan. This museum developed the exhibition in close collaboration with Adnan before her death in November 2021.
